talks.title: The Case for Whimsy
talks.resume: This talk explores various ways that we, as front-end developers, can make our products more delightful to use. While it’s design’s job to give us static mock-ups, it’s our job to bring those designs to life.

talks.title: Native vs Javascript
talks.resume: For the past year Krzysztof has been working on react-native-gesture-handler – a library that exposes low level platform native capabilities related to gesture and touch handling to React Native.
